      • changeLineText

        public java.lang.Boolean changeLineText(int index,
                               java.lang.String newText)
        Changes the text for a specific line. Set index to 0 to change the scoreboard title.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the line.
        newText - The new text to display.
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false.

      • updateDisplay

        public java.lang.Boolean updateDisplay()
        Updates the display for the scoreboard.
        Returns:
        true is successful, else false.

      • updatePlayersBoards

        public void updatePlayersBoards()
        Updates the scoreboard for all players and spectators in the arena. Automatically called when using methods here. Scoreboards will not reflect changes until this method is called!

      • addSpectatorToScoreboard

        public java.lang.Boolean addSpectatorToScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Adds the player to the spectators team. Use addPlayerToScoreboard(Player, com.cloudcraftgaming.novagameslib.team.Team) to add a player to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to add.
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false.

      • addPlayerToScoreboard

        public java.lang.Boolean addPlayerToScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                      Team team)
        Adds the player to the scoreboard under the proper team. Use addSpectatorToScoreboard(Player) to add a spectator to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to add.
        team - The team to add them to (can be null if not using teams).
        Returns:
        true is successful, else false.

      • removeSpectatorFromBoard

        public java.lang.Boolean removeSpectatorFromBoard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes the player from the spectators team. Use removePlayerFromScoreboard(Player, com.cloudcraftgaming.novagameslib.team.Team) to remove a player rather than a spectator.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove.
        Returns:
        true us successful, else false.

      • removePlayerFromScoreboard

        public java.lang.Boolean removePlayerFromScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                           Team team)
        Removes the player from the scoreboard. Use removeSpectatorFromBoard(Player) to remove a spectator rather than a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove.
        team - The team to remove them from (can be null if not using teams).
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false.
